questions: Can you elaborate on your experience in Information Technology over the past 6 years?
How have you utilized your skills in AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes in your professional roles?
Can you provide specific examples of projects where you implemented AWS services?
How do you stay updated on the latest trends and developments in the field of Information Technology, particularly in cloud computing and containerization?
Have you worked on any projects involving the integration of Docker and Kubernetes? If so, can you describe your role and contributions?
How do you approach problem-solving and troubleshooting issues related to AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes?
What certifications or training have you completed in AWS, Docker, or Kubernetes to enhance your skills and knowledge?
Can you discuss a challenging project or problem you encountered in your IT career and how you successfully resolved it using your skills in AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes?
How do you prioritize and manage tasks when working on multiple projects simultaneously, especially those involving cloud technologies like AWS?
In what ways do you collaborate with team members or stakeholders to implement and optimize cloud-based solutions using AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes?
